title: Dataproc - BigQuery connector code samples
abstract:
# Dataproc - BigQuery connector code samples
All Cloud Dataproc clusters come with the [BigQuery connector for Hadoop](/hadoop/bigquery-connector) built in. This means you can easily and quickly read and write BigQuery data to and from Cloud Dataproc.
content:
## Using Spark
See [Using the BigQuery Connector with Spark](/dataproc/docs/tutorials/bigquery-connector-spark-example) for an example on using Spark with the BigQuery connector for Hadoop. This example should work for Cloud Dataproc clusters.
## Using Java MapReduce
See [Writing a MapReduce Job with the BigQuery Connector](/dataproc/docs/tutorials/bigquery-connector-mapreduce-example) for an example on using Java MapReduce with the BigQuery connector for Hadoop. This example should work for Cloud Dataproc clusters.
## Additional information
See the [BigQuery Hadoop Connector](/dataproc/docs/connectors/bigquery) documentation for more information.
